articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: "Final Call On Asia Cup Venue To Be Taken After IPL 2023 Final": Jay Shah - NDTV Sports
articles.description: The window for the Asia Cup this year is between September 1-17.
articles.content: A final decision on the country -- or countries -- hosting the Asia Cup will be taken on the sidelines of the IPL final, which will be attended by a host of top Asian Cricket Council (ACC) dignitarie… [+2043 chars]
